revised_title: Correction of an Error in Fossil Plant Leaf Scar Identification
tldr: The author corrects a mistake in identifying the leaf scars of fossil plants, specifically in the distinction between Lepidodendroid and Lepidophloios leaves. The error was caused by misinterpreting the orientation of the leaves, which led to incorrect illustrations and descriptions of internal structures. The corrected understanding of these structures provides valuable insights into the organization of ancient plants.
